OUR SERVICES

Paragon offers an extensive array of shipboard services, emphasizing expertise in hydraulic crane and deck equipment repair, installation, and technical representation

While based in Virginia, our professional services have a global reach, catering to ports, bases, and shipyards worldwide.

Paragon Hydraulics recognized a significant gap in technical oversight for shipboard cargo and boat handling equipment, leading to substantial inefficiencies and associated costs for the US Navy.

Our services extend to the installation and maintenance of cranes, cargo handling equipment, deck and huwe provide OEM Technical Representation for crane equipment and comprehensive solutions for the installation and repair of various shipboard mechanical systems.

With increasing threat of global conflict, the United States Navy must stay capable and ready to defend. Paragon Hydraulics assists in completing that mission the right way.

General technical services
  • Hydraulic crane and davit repair, removal, installation, and technical representative services
  • Hydraulic crane preventative maintenance
  • Hydraulic cylinder repair and testing
  • Hydraulic door and ramp repair
  • Cargo handling equipment repair (5y inspection)
  • Pump and motor overhauls and alignments
  • Mechanical equipment repair, removal, and installation
  • Shipboard equipment inspections and operational testing
  • Engineering services
  • 24/7 Emergency equipment repair globally
  • Training programs
  • 009-90 support
  • Operations support
  • Remote technical support
  • GFM Storage
  • Hull and deck machinery

who we provide services to

  • United States Navy
  • Military Sealift Command
  • Commercial Marine and Offshore
  • NAVSEA
  • MARMC
  • United States Coast Guard
  • SWARMC
  • Ship Repair Contractor/Vendors
